name: Sensors Adapter
description: Syngenta moisture and light sensors integration with pluggable architecture for future sensor types.

prd.problemStatement: Sensor data provides real-time insights into course conditions. Starting with Syngenta sensors and enabling future expansion supports data-driven turf management.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want sensor data integrated so that I can make data-driven irrigation decisions
As a superintendent, I want moisture readings so that I can optimize water usage
